Home Résumé
Hi! I'm Michael.

Mentorship

I'm a Code:You Mentor!

I'm very excited to be a mentor for Code:You, an organization that provides free coding classes.

About Me

I was born and raised in Louisville. I went to Manual High School and Western Kentucky University. I spent some time in San Francisco at Apple. I returned home and worked at Humana, and now I work remotely for Google.

Most days, I like to stay home and watch movies with my partner and my dog (a medium-sized labradoodle). Whenever I'm outside, I'm usually playing Pokemon Go.

I live in the Clifton neighborhood.

Contacting Me

Feel free to get in touch with me for advice, questions, or just to say hi!
